nodes.text: Jer'Jo Cam'Co was one of the founding syndics of the Chiss.

He proposed the creation of the Chiss Expansionary Defense Force after exploration efforts revealed several resource rich worlds. As a result of this, many old records found in the Expeditionary Library held his name. At least seven Chiss vessels were named for him, as well as two star systems.

Jacen Solo encountered the name several times when using the Library to find Zonama Sekot. When he asked Wynssa Fel who Jer'Jo Cam'Co was, it was Commander Irolia who explained to him of the Syndic's history.
